Mount Blue Criterium

2014-05-05 20:32:52 -0400

Despite having only a few weeks to pull together a venue change due to the unsafe road conditions, Pete Macleod was able to string together a really fun event with an awesome Boston’s Baddest Burgers food truck, some super Flat Black coffee and lots of hard, fun racing.

 

Thanks to all of the volunteers working registration, parking and course marshalling. Without you, we can’t pull these events off.

 

Ari Shocket (Masters 40+) and Mike O’Donnell (Cat 4) on the Podium!

 

Mount Blue Criterium (May 4 2014)
Chad GUEVREMONT Cat 5A 7/27
Peter WERNER Cat 5A 10/27
Scott HARRINGTON Cat 5A 12/27
Tony ZANON Cat 5A DNF
Peter WERNER Cat 5B 4/28

More Solid Results at the Quabbin Reservoir Classic

2014-05-05 10:11:00 -0400

The Road Team was out in force at the Quabbin Reservoir Classic suffering through some brutal conditions. You can read their stories here in our forum.

 

Quabbin Reservoir Classic Road Race (Apr 26 2014)
Jonathan Doller 4/5 40+ 14/31
William Paredes 4/5 40+ 26/31
Adam Shutes C 4/5 10/44
Brian Albert C 4/5 31/44

 

ECCC Conference Championships Criterium (Apr 28 2014)
Chad Guevremont C 4/5 32/46

 

Fat Tire Classic, Winding Trails, Farmington, CT (Apr 27 2014)
Richard Walsh Cat 3 50 + 10/12

Another Boston Marathon Ride In The Books and Racing Continues!

2014-04-23 00:32:57 -0400

BHCC had another succesfull ride along the Boston Marathon Route this Marathon Monday. 6 Mountain Bikers hit the dirt at the 2nd stop of the Root 66 Race series while Johnathan Doller led the CAT 4 Team to a podium finish at the Mystic Velo Criterium. You can read about their race reports here in our forum.

Rocky Woods Lung Challenge, Taunton, MA April 19th, 2014
Pete MacLeod Pro Open 999
Pete Werner Men CAT 1 30-39 7/17
Scott Taylor Men CAT 2 40-49 5/22
Tucker Walsh Men CAT 2 40-49 8/22
Ted Myles Men CAT 3 40-49 4/7
Rick Doherty Men CAT 3 40+ 7/7
Richard Walsh Men CAT 3 50+ 6/7

 

Mystic Velo Criterium, April 19th, 2014
Jonathan Doller Men Cat 4 Open 3/36
Michael O'donnell Men Cat 4 Open 8/36
Austin Guyette Men Cat 5 Open 8/15
